overview:
As a highly regarded tech industry veteran, Mr. Mansfield brings a wealth of leadership and executive management experience in sales and business development. Leading NetSuite’s sales operations and business development efforts in the U.S., EMEA and Asia Pacific, Mr. Mansfield is charged with driving the company’s winning strategy for on-demand software sales, strategic partnerships, customer success and growing the customer base globally.

Prior to joining NetSuite, Mr. Mansfield held senior management positions with Brocade Communications Inc., where he was responsible for the sales organization’s international region. At Plumtree Software Inc., he was vice president of Asia Pacific and Japan, and led the product entry into the Asian markets.

Previously, Mr. Mansfield held several executive positions at Network Associates, ultimately leading all non-U.S. operations as vice president of International Sales & Operations.

Mr. Mansfield holds an honours degree in Law from the University of London.
